text: Bernadette Karpf (born 3 July 1996) is a German ice hockey player for ESC Planegg and the German national team.2019 IIHF Women's World Championship roster She participated at the 2015 IIHF Women's World Championship.2015 IIHF World Championship roster ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:People from Landshut Category:German women's ice hockey forwards
title: Bernadette Karpf
